meanings.definition: A carbohydrate containing six carbon atoms.
meanings.sent1: The hexosan provided energy for the body.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study hexosan to understand its role in nutrition.
meanings.sent3: The hexosan molecule threw a party for the other carbohydrates.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a hexosan molecule.
meanings.sent5: The hexosan structure resembled a tiny sugar castle.

meanings.definition: Any of a class of sugars containing six carbon atoms.
meanings.sent1: The bakery used hexosan to sweeten their pastries.
meanings.sent2: Hexosan can be found in various fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The hexosan sugar danced in the bowl, making the recipe extra special.
meanings.sent4: His words were as comforting as a spoonful of hexosan.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of hexosan filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
